items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes and comments in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: When a user updates a task status, all team members see the change within 2 seconds.
When a comment is added to a task, all team members receive a notification within 2 seconds.
non_functional: System must handle at least 500 concurrent users without performance degradation
Update latency must be under 2 seconds for 95% of events

notes: The user requirement was vague; assumed core collaboration feature is real-time updates. Additional collaboration features like file sharing or chat may be needed in future.
